attributes.action: ask the Secretary for Culture, Media & Sport to extend the proposals for free swimming in England & Wales to cover disabled people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has recently announced that it is to offer free swimming for over-60s and later to include under-16s.

Disabled people find conventional gym excercise difficult but relish hydrotherapy. As such, we agree that that the proposals for over 60s be extended to include people with disabilities.  This would form part of their therapy which is currently provided for free on the NHS.
